Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove OpenXmlPackage.SaveAs and replace references with Clone()" (#1398) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "remove OpenXmlPackage.SaveAs and replace references with Clone()" (#1398) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Closed issue "Allow OpenXmlPackage and OpenXmlPart to be easily customized" (#1277) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: The last couple of years has seen some fundamental changes internally to how packages and parts are handled. I'd like to see it continue becoming more flexible so that people can develop their own packages/parts if needed (if anything, this should simplify some of the behavior of our own implementations that currently need InternalsVisibleTo)

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed pull request "Update README.md" (#1396) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Remove EnumString and introduce IEnumValue and IEnumFactory<>" (#1397) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This reworks how we're doing enum parsing so we are no longer using C# enums. That incurred a cost while parsing and writing and was challenging for AOT and trimming due to its use of reflection. This now uses a struct that implements two interfaces that allows us to have almost free parsing/writing. The only thing here that costs is checking if a value is valid or potentially getting the version.
